StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetWFVPacCardRows]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgId uniqueiden..er = null, @RecruiterId uniqueiden..er = null, @ScheduledEventsStart date.me, @ScheduledEventsEnd date.me, @EventTypeID int = null, @OnlyNextScheduledEvent bit = 1 )
AS
select et.id INTO #PACEventType from rssoss.usmc.eventsource es inner join rssoss.usmc.eventype et on et.eventsourceid = es.id where es.name = 'PAC' and eventsourcetypeid = 2
DECLARE @Organiza.onID INT
SELECT @Organiza.onID = ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE rowguid = @orgid
SELECT STATUS_TYPE ,STATUS_CODE ,DISPOSITION_CODE ,STATUS_DESCRIPTION ,DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION INTO #STATUS_DISPOSITION FROM mcriss.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION sd_inner WHERE sd_inner.STATUS_DESCRIPTION IN ('NWA') AND sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE IN ('EA')
SELECT nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID ,nwa.NWA_ID ,nwa.WORKING_RECRUITER_ID ,nwa.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID ,nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID ,nwa.rowguid ,nwa.NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING ,sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION AS Disposi.on INTO #NWA FROM [MCRISS].[DBO].[NWA] nwa INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[DBO].CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON nwa.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID AND cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(cs2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] CS2 WHERE CS.NWA_ID = CS2.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN #STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON cs.[STATUS_TYPE] = sd.[STATUS_TYPE] AND cs.[STATUS_CODE] = sd.[STATUS_CODE] AND cs.[DISPOSITION_CODE] = sd.[DISPOSITION_CODE] WHERE nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @Organiza.onID
SELECT rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, rp.rowguid, rp.RANK_CODE, rp.ORGANIZATION_ID, rcrtr.LAST_NAME, rcrtr.FIRST_NAME, rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Recruiter ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterShortName INTO #Recrui.ngPerson FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] rcrtr ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = rcrtr.PERSON_ID WHERE ((rp.RowGuid = @RecruiterId AND @RecruiterId IS NOT NULL) OR (@RecruiterId IS NULL)) AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onId
SELECT prs.personid ,prs.prospec.d AS ApplicantAssetID ,prs.NwaId AS SecondaryID ,prs.PACCreateDate AS CreateDate ,prs.ProspectDisposi.onId ,prs.Recrui.ngPersonId ,prs.prospec.d ,prs.nwaid ,prs.paccreatedate ,pd.ProspectDisposi.onDescrip.on AS Disposi.on ,COALESCE(RTRIM(per.LastName), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(per.FirstName), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(per.MiddleName), SPACE(0)) AS ApplicantAssetName ,per.Gender ,prs.source AS Source ,prs.sourceDual AS SourceDual INTO #Prospect FROM [USMC].[Prospect] prs INNER JOIN #Recrui.ngPerson rp ON rp.rowguid = prs.Recrui.ngPersonId INNER JOIN [USMC].[Person] per ON per.PersonID = prs.PersonID INNER JOIN [USMC].[ProspectDisposi.on] pd ON prs.ProspectDisposi.onId = pd.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND prs.ProspectDisposi.onId > 1
CREATE TABLE #PacCardTable ( CreateDate date.me, ApplicantAssetID uniqueiden..er, ApplicantAssetName varchar(256), Gender varchar(1), SecondaryID uniqueiden..er, RecruiterID uniqueiden..er, Recruiter varchar(256), RecruiterShortName varchar(256), Disposi.on varchar(256), EventID uniqueiden..er, EventDate date.me, Source varchar(240), SourceDual varchar(240), EventTypeOther varchar(256), EventType varchar(256) )
CREATE TABLE #Events ( ApplicantId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,EventID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,StartDate DATETIME ,EventTypeID INT ,EventTypeOther varchar(256) ,EventType varchar(256) )
INSERT INTO #Events SELECT es.SubjectId AS ApplicantId ,e.ID AS EventID ,e.StartDate ,e.EventTypeID ,e.EventTypeOther ,et.[Type] as EventType FROM #Prospect prs INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es ON (es.SubjectID = prs.ProspectId OR es.SubjectId = prs.NwaId) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.ID = es.EventID inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] et on et.ID = e.EventTypeId INNER JOIN #PACEventType pet ON pet.id = e.EventTypeId
INSERT INTO #Events SELECT es.SubjectId AS ApplicantId ,es.ID AS EventID ,e.StartDate ,e.EventTypeID ,e.EventTypeOther ,et.[Type] as EventType FROM #NWA nwa INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es ON (es.SubjectId = nwa.rowguid) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.ID = es.EventID inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] et on et.ID = e.EventTypeId INNER JOIN #PACEventType pet ON pet.id = e.EventTypeId LEFT OUTER JOIN #Events e2 ON e2.even.d = e.ID WHERE e2.even.d IS NULL
INSERT INTO #PacCardTable SELECT prs.PACCreateDate AS CreateDate ,prs.[ProspectID] AS ApplicantAssetID ,prs.ApplicantAssetName ,prs.Gender ,prs.NwaId AS SecondaryID ,rp.[rowguid] AS RecruiterID ,rp.Recruiter ,rp.RecruiterShortName ,prs.Disposi.on ,e.EventID AS EventID ,e.StartDate AS EventDate ,prs.source AS Source ,prs.sourceDual AS SourceDual ,e.EventTypeOther ,e.EventType FROM #Prospect prs INNER JOIN #Recrui.ngPerson rp ON rp.rowguid = prs.Recrui.ngPersonId INNER JOIN #Events e on e.ApplicantId = prs.prospec.d WHERE e.StartDate >= @ScheduledEventsStart AND e.StartDate < @ScheduledEventsEnd AND (e.EventTypeId = @EventTypeID OR @EventTypeID IS NULL) AND (e.StartDate IN ( SELECT MIN(e2.StartDate) FROM #Events e2 WHERE (e2.ApplicantId = e.ApplicantId) AND e2.StartDate >= GetDate() ) OR @OnlyNextScheduledEvent = 0 AND e.StartDate >= GetDate())
INSERT INTO #PacCardTable SELECT nwa.NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING AS CreateDate ,prs.[ProspectID] AS ApplicantAssetID ,COALESCE(RTRIM(per.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(per.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(per.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS ApplicantAssetName ,prs1.Gender ,[NWA].[rowguid] AS SecondaryID ,rp.[rowguid] AS RecruiterID ,rp.Recruiter ,rp.RecruiterShortName ,nwa.Disposi.on ,e.EventID AS EventID ,e.StartDate AS EventDate ,prs.source AS Source ,prs.sourceDual AS SourceDual ,e.EventTypeOther ,e.EventType FROM #NWA nwa INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] per ON nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = per.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN #Recrui.ngPerson rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = COALESCE(nwa.WORKING_RECRUITER_ID,nwa.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID) INNER JOIN #Events e on e.ApplicantId = nwa.rowguid INNER JOIN #Prospect prs1 on prs1.NwaId = nwa.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].Prospect prs ON prs.NWAID = nwa.RowGuid
WHERE (nwa.rowguid IS NOT NULL) AND prs.NwaId IS NULL AND e.StartDate >= @ScheduledEventsStart AND e.StartDate < @ScheduledEventsEnd AND (e.EventTypeId = @EventTypeID OR @EventTypeID IS NULL) AND (e.StartDate IN ( SELECT MIN(e2.StartDate) FROM #Events e2 WHERE (e2.ApplicantId = e.ApplicantId) AND e2.StartDate >= GetDate() ) OR @OnlyNextScheduledEvent = 0)-- this returns all the events when set to 0
SELECT * FROM #PacCardTable
DROP TABLE #NWA DROP TABLE #PacCardTable DROP TABLE #Recrui.ngPerson DROP TABLE #STATUS_DISPOSITION DROP TABLE #Prospect DROP TABLE #PACEventType DROP TABLE #Events
